content.text: The elizaOS/eliza repository has shown significant activity over a two-day period. On June 9, 2025, there were 14 new PRs (with 13 merged), 2 new issues, and 10 active contributors. Activity increased on June 10, 2025, with 25 new PRs (23 merged), 1 new issue, and 13 active contributors. Overall, this indicates a healthy, active project with consistent developer engagement and a strong PR merge rate.
PR #5018 by @lalalune titled 'feat: Dynamic loading of database tables, rebuild plugin-sql, ' is merged, implementing dynamic database table loading and rebuilding the SQL plugin.
PR #5019 by @ChristopherTrimboli titled 'chore: 1.0.7' is merged, preparing for version 1.0.7 release.
PR #5025 by @ChristopherTrimboli titled 'chore: v1.0.7' is merged, finalizing the version 1.0.7 release.
PR #5010 by @wtfsayo titled 'feat: Reorganize API routes into logical domain-based structure' is merged, improving API organization.
PR #5016 by @wtfsayo titled 'feat: migrate CLI prompts from prompts library to @clack/prompts' is merged, enhancing CLI user experience.
PR #4989 titled 'chore: HMR client dev' is merged, improving hot module replacement for client development.
PR #4986 titled 'fix:publish command logging issues and conditional GitHub authentication' is merged, addressing publishing command bugs.
PR #5009 titled 'feat: add lockfile cleanup for GitHub fallback installations' is merged, enhancing GitHub installation reliability.
PR #5024 titled 'add buildGitHubSpecifier' is merged, adding GitHub specifier building functionality.
PR #5022 titled 'fix: dup CI runs and cancel workflows on push' is merged, optimizing CI workflow execution.
PR #5021 titled 'feat: replace cursor rules with elizaos/.cursor submodule' is merged, improving cursor rule management.
PR #5015 titled 'chore: Parallelize CI actions' is merged, improving CI performance through parallelization.
PR #5014 titled 'chore: cache bun / models in github actions' is merged, optimizing GitHub Actions with caching.
PR #5013 titled 'fix: cleanup DB in E2E tests, make fresh unique DB, PGLITE_WASM_MODE: node' is merged, improving test database management.
PR #5012 titled 'chore: update versions' is merged, updating dependency versions.
PR #5011 titled 'refactor: centralize directory detection with monorepo support' is merged, improving directory structure handling.
PR #5051 by @ChristopherTrimboli titled 'chore: v1.0.8' is open, preparing for version 1.0.8 release.
PR #5046 by @madjin titled 'chore: Update docs' is open, improving project documentation.
PR #5036 by @wtfsayo titled 'refactor: reorganize cli commands into modular structure' is merged, improving CLI architecture.
PR #4968 titled 'fix: implement real-time message deletion via SocketIO' is merged, enabling real-time message deletion functionality.
PR #5020 titled 'feat: refactor / split core types' is merged, improving core type organization.
PR #5048 titled 'fix: load the env config before agent project is loaded' is merged, correcting environment configuration loading sequence.
PR #5047 titled 'chore: add comprehensive Postman collection for elizaOS APIs' is merged, providing API testing resources.
PR #5044 titled 'Fix: Enable loading project agents when no character files specified' is merged, improving agent loading flexibility.
PR #5043 titled 'chore: migrate all generated files into .eliza' is merged, centralizing generated file storage.
PR #5042 titled 'chore: OpenTelemetry instrumentation while preserving Sentry' is merged, enhancing monitoring capabilities.
PR #5041 titled 'fix: (cli) resolve double update messaging and improve elizaos update instructions' is merged, improving update notifications.
PR #5038 titled 'chore: remove model caching since its slower' is merged, optimizing performance by removing slower caching.
PR #5035 titled 'fix: remove message from chat UI on delete' is merged, improving chat message deletion UI behavior.
PR #5034 titled 'fix: chat history selector reloads' is merged, addressing chat history selection issues.
PR #5033 titled 'fix: onboarding user settings error' is merged, resolving user onboarding settings problems.
PR #5032 titled 'fix: convert dates, fix agent create' is merged, addressing date conversion and agent creation issues.
PR #5031 titled 'chore: fix typos' is merged, correcting typographical errors.
PR #5030 titled 'feat: add dummy services' is merged, implementing placeholder service functionality.
PR #5028 titled 'fix: remove truncate' is merged, removing truncation functionality.
PR #5027 titled 'fix: Ensure waitForServer uses SERVER_PORT env if provided' is merged, improving server port configuration.
PR #5026 titled 'feat: Add target to Content' is merged, enhancing content targeting capabilities.
PR #5049 titled 'fix: dup chats' is merged, resolving duplicate chat issues.
Issue #5017 titled 'Callback from plugin action not making it to end user response in chat' by @jonathanprozzi is OPEN.
Issue #4972 titled 'MessageBusService: Agent not a participant in channel {channelId}, ignoring message' by @exitsimulation is CLOSED.
Issue #4894 titled 'Twitter Client fails to start with the new release 1.0.2' by @affanmustafa is CLOSED.
Issue #4927 titled 'Refreshing on an agent chat shows error' by @scottrepreneur is CLOSED.
Issue #5005 titled 'LOG_LEVEL from .env Not Working in 1.0.6' by @harperaa is CLOSED.
Issue #5039 titled 'Unable to load custom characters after upgrading to 1.0.7' by @jonathanprozzi is CLOSED with 5 comments.

categories.title: Crypto Market Data from codexAnalytics
content: All tracked cryptocurrencies (WETH, SOL, WBTC, and ai16z) showed price increases between the two reporting periods.
